comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Another Bain/LOC photo shows us his father, Charles H. Ebbets, Senior (standing at right, hands behind his back):
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/3220574134/#]

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
And here's a player named Leo Callahan, in another Bain/LOC image, taken aboard the same ship as Ebbets junior's photo (although Bain's clerk has dated them a day apart, in February, 1914) -- and on the same deck:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4910526500/in/photostream/]

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
And now LOC has posted yet another Bain Agency photo taken aboard that boat -- the "City of Macon" -- and also dated, like the Ebbets photo, 2/25/14:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4953638577/in/photostream/]

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
A Bain/LOC photo of the entire ship, posted to Flickr on November 26, 2010:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5209396976/]
